scripts.build: npm run build-src && npm run build-test
scripts.test: npm run test-project && npx nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=clover --reporter=text npx lerna run --concurrency=4 test-all
scripts.test-all-dev: npm run test-project && npm run test-dev
scripts.test-clean: npx lerna clean --yes && npx lerna bootstrap --no-ci
scripts.test-old: npx nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=clover --reporter=text npx lerna run test-old
scripts.test-project: npm run license-check && npx depcheck --ignores 'rimfaf,husky,codeclimate-test-reporter,directory-fixture-provider' && npm run standard-fix
